item.title: Basic YAML File
item.description: YAML files can optionally begin and end with ---. ---# This is a basic YAML filename:Chrisjob:Wikimediapet:dog---

item.title: Comments
item.description: Comments in YAML are preceeded by # and a space. ---# This is a comment. name:Chrisjob:Wikimediapet:dog---

item.title: Comments
item.description: Strings in ---# This is a comment. name:Chrisjob:Wikimediapet:dog---

item.title: Installing Kubeflow On Ubuntu
item.description: In 2017, I built this deep learning machine as a solution to my growing AWS bill. In 2020, I struggled to get this machine to run Kubeflow locally. Here are the instructions that worked for me. Some of these instructions are based on this Ubuntu.com tutorial. Turn On Virtualization On AMD Chipset In BIOS, go to: M.I.T. Advanced Frequency Settings Advanced CPU Core Settings Set SVM Mode to Enabled Install MicroK8s MicroK8s is a small version of Kubernetes that will work well locally.
